## Example
### Basic Usage

``` html
<lcap-h5-iframe src="https://sf.s3.amazonaws.com"></lcap-h5-iframe>
```

## API
### Props/Attrs

| Prop/Attr | Type | Options | Default | Description |
| --------- | ---- | ------- | ------- | ----------- |
| src | string |  |  | Web page address to be embedded |
